personal.name: Muhammad Uzair
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.summary: A highly driven and enthusiastic Software Engineer with over 3+ years of professional experience in developing scalable, high-performance applications. I possess proven expertise in backend engineering and data-driven feature delivery for high-traffic platforms. I excel at handling confidential data while developing analytical features and working with agile teams to build strong solutions.

achievements: Engineered a robust MEAN stack-based CRM and ERP platform for the real estate domain
Designed and developed backend features in a data-dependent and data-driven environment, handling sensitive datasets for analytics-based features
Implemented advanced modules including KPI computation, detailed user management, and analytics dashboards to enhance platform capabilities
Collaborated in agile sprints, applying design patterns to improve scalability and maintainability
Contributed to Yehaww.com, a niche social platform for the equestrian industry
Developed backend logic in Node.js, implemented MySQL databases, integrated Stripe payments, AWS S3 storage, and Mailgun email services
Created RESTful APIs for secure and efficient data retrieval
